verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Savior to Thee my all I now surrender Thine altogether - Thine alone to be For Thou hast ransomed Purchased and redeemed me With Thy heart's blood Upon th'accursed tree{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}To pay my debt I see Thee Bruised and bleeding The spotless Lamb To bear my sin and shame O Savior long Have I withstood Thy pleading Too long witheld From Thee Thy lawful claim{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Take all I have My life - my health - my talents And consecrate them To Thy service sweet 'Twas from Thy hand they came Behold I lay them A grateful tribute At Thy sacred feet{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Oh teach me how To tell the wondrous story Of Thy great love To sinners far and wide To live - to speak - to labor For Thy glory The glory of a Savior crucified{/lang-eng}
